svg.text: Complete the exercises below to check your understanding of what you learned in Section 1.
If you have questions, consult the Language Reference section.
Match the times shown in Chinese to the times shown on the clocks.
Rearrange the Chinese words and phrases in each row to translate the English.
The basketball game didn’t start until 6:18.
She didn’t start reading that book until 9 p.m. last night.
